WorkItem.ClosedComment: Working as intended. Rawr gets its item data from Wowhead/Armory so its only as accurate as they are.
WorkItem.Description: My druid has Mask of Distant Memories from the heroic 5men of AT, which is iLevel 219.  Yet it shows up as iLevel 213, the non-heroic version.
WorkItem.Summary: Item scaling for Argent Tournament doesn't work properly

Comments.Message: v2.2.11 was released with the latest data on Wowhead at the time. That data isn't 100% accurate. Refresh the item cache from Wowhead, to get the latest data.
(Just checked, Wowhead currently doesn't have the latest data for this item, though Armory does; you can refresh from there.)
